languages.text: Ефрат-II захвачен еретиками из культа Последнего восхода. Лорд-инквизитор желает, чтобы священный мир Механикус был как можно скорее вырван из лап предателей. Право свершить правосудие Императора доверено Вольному Торговцу.

Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.
languages.original_text: Ефрат-II захвачен еретиками из культа Последнего восхода. Лорд-инквизитор желает, чтобы священный мир Механикус был как можно скорее вырван из лап предателей. Право свершить правосудие Императора доверено Вольному Торговцу.

traits.locale_text: Eufrates II is under the control of heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

Eufrates II is under the control of heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

languages.text: Euphrate-II est sous le contrôle des hérétiques de l'Aube finale. Le seigneur inquisiteur souhaite que le monde sacré de l'Adeptus Mechanicus soit repris aux traîtres le plus rapidement que possible. Le droit de rendre le jugement de l'Empereur appartient {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Euphrate-II est sous le contrôle des hérétiques de l'Aube finale. Le seigneur inquisiteur souhaite que le monde sacré de l'Adeptus Mechanicus soit repris aux traîtres le plus rapidement que possible. Le droit de rendre le jugement de l'Empereur appartient {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 欧夫拉茨二号星已经落入了“终末黎明”的异端分子手中，大审判官希望尽快从那群叛徒手中夺回属于机械修会的神圣世界。如今，传达帝皇的判决这一神圣使命，落在了行商浪人的肩上。
languages.original_text: Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: 欧夫拉茨二号星已经落入了“终末黎明”的异端分子手中，审判长希望尽快从那群叛徒手中夺回属于机械修会的神圣世界。如今，传达帝皇的判决这一神圣使命，落在了行商浪人的肩上。

languages.text: ユーフラテス・IIは最後の夜明けの異端者たちの支配下にある。ロード・インクィジターの願いは、帝国技術局の神聖な惑星を可及的速やかに反逆者の手から奪い取ることである。皇帝の審判を下す権利は自由開拓者にある。
languages.original_text: Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: ユーフラテス・IIは最後の夜明けの異端者たちの支配下にある。ロード・インクィジターの願いは、帝国技術局の神聖な惑星を可及的速やかに反逆者の手から奪い取ることである。皇帝の審判を下す権利は自由開拓者にある。

languages.text: Eufrates II steht unter der Kontrolle der Ketzer der Letzten Dämmerung. Es ist der Wunsch des Großinquisitors, dass die heilige Welt des Adeptus Mechanicus so rasch wie möglich aus dem Würgegriff der Verräter befreit wird. Das Recht, das Urteil des Imperators zu verkünden, steht {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Eufrates II steht unter der Kontrolle der Ketzer der Letzten Dämmerung. Es ist der Wunsch des Großinquisitors, dass die heilige Welt des Adeptus Mechanicus so rasch wie möglich aus dem Würgegriff der Verräter befreit wird. Das Recht, das Urteil des Imperators zu verkünden, steht {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu.

languages.text: Eufrates II está en manos de los herejes del Amanecer Final. El Lord Inquisidor quiere que el mundo sagrado del Adeptus Mechanicus quede libre de traidores tan pronto como sea posible. El derecho a ejecutar el juicio del Emperador recae sobre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.

traits.locale_text: Eufrates II está en manos de los herejes del Amanecer Final. El Lord Inquisidor quiere que el mundo sagrado del Adeptus Mechanicus quede libre de traidores tan pronto como sea posible. El derecho a ejecutar el juicio del Emperador recae sobre {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: Eufrates II, Nihai Şafak'ın kâfirlerinin kontrolü altında. Lord Engizisyoncu, kutsal Adeptus Mechanicus dünyasının en kısa zamanda hainlerin elinden kurtarılmasını istiyor. İmparator'un kararını duyurma hakkı Hür Tacir'e ait.
languages.original_text: Eufrates II is under the control of the heretics of the Final Dawn. It is the Lord Inquisitor's wish that the sacred world of the Adeptus Mechanicus be wrested from the hands of the traitors as expediently as possible. The right to deliver the Emperor's judgement belongs to the Rogue Trader.
